items.title: Real-time Collaborative Task Boards
items.description: Enable multiple team members to view, create, and update tasks on shared boards in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Multiple users can simultaneously edit the same task board without data loss
Changes made by one user are visible to all other users within 2 seconds
Users can assign tasks to specific team members
Task status updates are reflected instantly across all devices
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users per board
Data synchronization latency must be under 2 seconds
UI should be responsive across desktop and mobile devices

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed core feature is a shared task board with real-time updates for team collaboration.
